item.title: index
item.description: Welcome Hi, I’m Jacob — a recent Purdue University graduate with a degree in Cybersecurity.

item.title: Blog
item.description: I’m always working on something! Covid Epoch Time Track the passage of time since the start of the COVID-19 pandemic Accessing all my files from every device I made a solution that allows me to access all my files anywhere without using the cloud.

item.title: Services
item.description: File Share Quickly send and embed small files YouTube Archive YouTube Video Archive Slop Toob Live TV but its all slop File Drive Backup storage for files Live Stream The stream may break but the fun is guaranteed!! COVID Epoch Time Seconds since March 13, 2020 Food Database Find out what I’m cooing...

item.title: 50 more Terabytes
item.description: 4/23/2025 TLDR: Over the Summer I managed to buy 10 more hard drives (WD Red Plus’s). Each one was 10TB and was going to be installed into my NAS.

item.title: Covid Epoch Time
item.description: 6/24/2025 TDLR: I made a website that tracks the seconds since the day school shut down for COVID-19 in Illinois.

item.title: Accessing all my files from every device
item.description: 6/19/2025 TLDR: I used Synching to backup and sync all my files across 3 states and 4 devices.
